page.title: 13My Weekend,Bradford
page.content: I got up on Saturday morning at 7 o' clock and went down to watch TV.Then I got dressed and had breakfast.I had Wheataflakes.I then went out to play. After my dinner I had to get into my newspaper costume because I was on the float for the June Fair,which is to raise money for the church.I had to meet the float behind the library and then we went to the church hall.I entered the fancy dress show.I played out after tea and then went to bed. On Sunday,after getting up and having breakfast,I went out to play with Andrew,Tanya And Sara.At Andrew's house we put on some records and had a disco.After tea I called for Sara.She had her tent up and we played in it. Later I went to my nana's and played.Then I called for Amanda and played funny games.My Dad then came for me -time for my bath and then bed.
